articles.description: Los Angeles County will offer a digital record of vaccinations in the Apple Wallet app on iPhones.
articles.content:
image copyrightGetty Images
People who get the coronavirus vaccine in Los Angeles will be able to keep proof of immunisation in their iPhone's digital wallet.
The record will live in the Apple Wall… [+3188 chars]
